page.title: 06TONBRIDGE THEATRE & ARTS:1
page.content: The Tonbridge Theatre and Arts Club is an amateur dramatics society,based at the Oast.It is run by acting memb- ers in their free time.Everything in the theatre is done by unpaid volun- teers,out of love.8 plays are produced each year for members and the general public.Hard-working members of the Oast feel justly proud of their ach- ievement.This is the only theatre in the area and the 112 seats are usually full throughout the 8 day run.They provide local entertainment,which is much appreciated in Tonbridge and Hil- denborough.There is also a youth sec- tion which puts on 2-3 shows a year. A local professional actress,who is a member,told us:"I don't think we could do much more,but we can do it for more people."Hence the plans for a Â£120,000 extension,including a new foyer,bar, lounge and dressing-rooms.
